mapper.select:
select
from park_car_in where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_delete=0

select
from park_car_in WHERE LEFT(car_no,3)='NOP' AND LEFT(car_no,7)<>'NOPLATE' ORDER BY CONVERT(SUBSTRING(car_no,4,5),SIGNED)

update park_car_in set guid = #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mach_no = #{machNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ykt_id = #{yktId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_flag = #{cFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, card_no = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card_type = #{cardType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, emp_name = #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, in_time = #{inTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, in_user_name = #{inUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_no = #{carNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assistant_car_no = #{assistantCarNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_car_no = #{modifyCarNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, in_pic = #{inPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, back_in_pic = #{backInPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, small_pic = #{smallPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assistant_small_pic = #{assistantSmallPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_no_type = #{carNoType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, small = #{small,jdbcType=INTEGER}, discount_no = #{discountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, discount_time = #{discountTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, makeup = #{makeup,jdbcType=INTEGER}, makeup_user_name = #{makeupUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_locked = #{isLocked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, in_way = #{inWay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_load = #{isLoad,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(id) from park_car_in where is_delete=0
select car_no from park_car_in where is_delete=0

select
from park_car_in where car_no in
#{item}
and small=0

Select Sum(Case when card_type in (31,32,33,34) then 1 else 0 end) as TmpCar, Sum(Case when card_type in (11,12,13,14,15,16,21,22,23,24) then 1 else 0 end) as MonthCar, Sum(Case when card_type in (51,52,53,54) then 1 else 0 end) as MoneyCar, Sum(Case when card_type in (41,42) then 1 else 0 end) as FreeCar from park_car_in where card_type <> 3 and Small=0 and mach_no in (Select mach_no from park_channel_set where in_out=0 or in_out=4 )

Select Sum(Case when card_type in (31,32,33,34) then 1 else 0 end) as TmpCar, Sum(Case when card_type in (11,12,13,14,15,16,21,22,23,24) then 1 else 0 end) as MonthCar, Sum(Case when card_type in (51,52,53,54) then 1 else 0 end) as MoneyCar, Sum(Case when card_type in (41,42) then 1 else 0 end) as FreeCar from park_car_in where card_type <> 3 and Small=1 and mach_no in (Select mach_no from park_channel_set where in_out=0 or in_out=4 )

select
from park_car_in where (is_load =0 or is_load is null) and is_delete=0 order by in_time limit 100
mapper.delete:
delete from park_car_in where is_load=1 and guid in
#{item}
mapper.select: select guid from park_car_in where is_load=0 and is_delete=1

select
from park_car_in where car_no in
#{item}
and card_type = #{cardType} and is_delete=0 order by in_time limit 1
